posts.html:
Jinxed Idol isn't the best choice, since it gives your opponent a way to get rid of any creatures you might want to give to them (like, say, Steel Golem). Or even just that Gilded Drake you used to steal their general-- It's probably doing you more good than them.

Another point, though: Obviously this is great for the cursed things you'd use with Donate or whatever, but let's not also forget that there are a lot of cards out there that don't really care who their controller is, including EDH staples like Arrest or Pithing Needle. Once you've cast these things, you might as well donate them the next time you have the mana to spare, to increase your lifegain and card advantage.

@Cyberium: This wouldn't work too well with the vows, though, since the "you" in "can't attack you" is the aura's controller.

[Scornful Egotist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scornful Egotist)- [donate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=donate) with [Puca's Mischief](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Puca's Mischief) or [Juxtapose](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Juxtapose) or donate unmorphed with this card  
[Burden of Guilt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burden of Guilt)- enchant fatty, donate aura with this card to another opponent, who then will most likely continue to tap down the fatty, using their resources while you gain life and cards  
[Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tibalt, the Fiend-Blooded)- draws removal/attackers early and if an opponent attempts to use it, will most likely damage them more, because you're still gaining life  
[Exotic Orchard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Exotic Orchard)- funny with [Rainbow Vale](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rainbow Vale), [Tarnished Citadel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tarnished Citadel), and [Fellwar Stone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fellwar Stone)  
[Bazaar Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bazaar Trader)- funny with [Dominus of Fealty](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dominus of Fealty), crappy lands  
[Illusions of Grandeur](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Illusions of Grandeur)- quintessential upkeep kill card
